channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Trapped Vehicle - Fatality; INC#0065; 01:19AM; 18101 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/40qgAwN; Northridge; Two car collision with one car against a building, one sheared hydrant, and three patients trapped. Firefighters conducted the auto extrication and transported three patients in *at least* serious condition. Additionally, two patients were determined dead on scene. All questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 0255. Drivers are advised to avoid the area as vehicles will remain in place until the completion of LAPD investigation and will impact traffic flow. ; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E104 E273 E290 E70 E73 EM15 EM17 EM9 HR3 RA100 RA104 RA70 RA73 RA87 T73 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#1675; 07:35PM; 799 N Almar Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46Z2uF2; Pacific Palisades; Multi-vehicle collision with six patients; three in *at least* serious condition and three with non-life threatening injuries (ages/genders unknown at this time). Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 4211.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E23 E269 E69 EM17 EM9 RA37 RA59 RA69 RA837 RA862 T69; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0311; 06:47AM; 20900 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sktxvA; Chatsworth; KNOCKDOWN: Size up corrected to a trash chute with dumpster fire which was extinguished by firefighters prior to an extension into the building. Additional resources canceled. No injuries reported.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E296 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0311; 06:31AM; 20900 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sktxvA; Chatsworth; One story, L shaped strip mall with fire showing through the roof in one unit. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E287 E296 E70 RA107 RA896 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Jumper; INC#1492; 06:28PM; 7650 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tW5Rhr; Van Nuys; A male patient is standing atop a five story building, threatening to jump. LAFD is in place with the air rescue cushion to support LAPD operation. LAPD Inc# 3854; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 E237 E239 E37 E39 E81 EM14 RA7 RA81 T37 T39; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0820; 12:27PM; 200 W F St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3s7uYO0; Wilmington; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. The extent of damage to the adjoining units is being determined. No further details.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC18 BC6 CM20 CM22 E238 E248 E285 E36 E38 E49 E85 EM13 RA38 RA85 SO1 T38 T48 T85; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

FIRE OUT Structure Fire; INC#0832; 12:11PM; 801 S Hope St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49hAUod; Downtown; Firefighters ascended to the 16th floor and located a fire out on the balcony of a unit. The exterior sprinkler activated and extinguished the fire. Crews are investigating to determine the extended of any water problems in the unit below due to sprinklers. There are no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC18 E10 E209 E210 E9 RA814 RA9 T10 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - High Rise; INC#0832; 12:11PM; 801 S Hope St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49hAUod; Downtown; 20 story, modern residential high rise building with nothing showing. There is sprinkler activation on the 16th floor with building's fire pump running and multiple alarm activations. Firefighters are investigating and drivers are advised to avoid Hope St between W 8th St and W 9th street due to LAFD apparatus.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC18 E10 E209 E210 E9 RA814 RA9 T10 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0820; 12:20PM; 200 W F St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3s7uYO0; Wilmington; The fire extended into the attic of the fire unit. The attic is shared with multiple attached bungalows. Additional resources are enroute. ; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC6 CM20 CM22 E238 E248 E285 E36 E38 E49 E85 EM13 RA38 RA85 SO1 T38 T48 T85; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0820; 12:07PM; 200 W F St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3s7uYO0; Wilmington; One story row of attached bungalows with heavy smoke showing from one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E38 E49 E85 RA38 RA85 T38 T85; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
